A

AcceuilController - Class in poo.main_project
FXML Controller class for the fxml file "Acceuil.fxml", it handles all user input and logic for the GUI of "Accueil" page
AcceuilController() - Constructor for class poo.main_project.AcceuilController
 
AchatController - Class in poo.main_project
FXML Controller class for the fxml file "Achat.fxml".

It handles all user input and logic for the GUI of "Approvisionnement" page:
Adds a bought quantity for existing products.
Adds a bought quantity for a new product.
Displays the list of made purchases.
AchatController() - Constructor for class poo.main_project.AchatController
 
App - Class in poo.main_project
JavaFX App The main class of application.

The program starts from here and loads the first fxml scene of authentification
App() - Constructor for class poo.main_project.App

initialize(URL, ResourceBundle) - Method in class poo.main_project.AchatController
This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded

Initilizes the controller class, sets up the table view and all of the other controls in the fxml file
It also contains all of the logic listed below :
Loads the sourceData from the database "Inventaire.xlsx"
Loads the sourceDatafournisseur from the database "Fournisseur.xlsx"
Defines the logic of the selling operation
initialize(URL, ResourceBundle) - Method in class poo.main_project.ClientController
This method is automatically called after the fxml file has been loaded

It also contains all of the logic listed below :
Loads the sourceData from the database "Client.xlsx"

InventaireController - Class in poo.main_project
FXML Controller class for the fxml file "Inventaire.fxml"

It handles all user input and logic for the GUI of "Inventaire" page
It displays the list of products in the stock, with their state
Includes fiters
InventaireController() - Constructor for class poo.main_project.InventaireController
 

J

JournalController - Class in poo.main_project
FXML Controller class for the fxml file "Journal.fxml"

It handles all user input and logic for the GUI of "Journal" page
It displays the list of all ins and outs of the stock in the form of bills
Includes fiters

searchedrow(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>, String) - Method in class poo.main_project.AchatController
Searches for the row in the databases with a specific id.
searchedrow(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>, String) - Method in class poo.main_project.VenteController
Searches for the row in the databases with a specific id.
searchedrow2(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>, String) - Method in class poo.main_project.AchatController
Searches for the row in the databases "Fournisseurs.xlxsx" with the specified name in str

Takes dataS: Our data source containing all of the providers "fournisseur" and the name of the provider we're looking for

Returns an arraylist which is a row in the database containing the provider with the specified name
searchedrow2(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>, String) - Method in class poo.main_project.VenteController
Searches for the row in the databases "Clients.xlxsx" with the specific name Takes : Our data source containing all of the providers "client" and the name of the cleint we're looking for Retruns an ArrayList of strings which is a row in the database containing clients with the specified name
SecondaryController - Class in poo.main_project
FXML Controller class for the fxml file "secondary.fxml"

It's the main page's controller It handles all user input and logic for the GUI of the main page
Contains the main layout of the app including the menu
Allows to switch between scenes
